DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , open-label , single sequence , denosumab single-dose study postmenopausal woman low bone mineral density ( BMD ) rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) treat etanercept .
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman ( postmenopausal define vaginal bleeding spot least 12 month ) Low bone mineral density ( BMD ) determine screen BMD Tscores lumbar spine ( L1 L4 ) , total evaluable vertebra ( few L1 L4 ) , total hip ≤ 1.0 Receiving 50mg dose etanercept weekly ≥ 6 month prior screen expect continue etanercept treatment dose frequency EOS If currently take methotrexate ( MTX ) , receive stable dose ( 7.5 20 mg/week ) MTX ≥ 8 week prior screen Willing able take ≥ 1,000 mg elemental calcium ≥ 400 IU vitamin D daily upon enrollment Type 1 diabetes ; OR poorly control Type 2 diabetes ( hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) > 8.0 % screening ; HbA1c ≤ 8.0 % within 6 month screen acceptable support laboratory documentation available ) History heart failure , coronary artery bypass graft , cardiac arrhythmia ; OR history acute coronary syndrome Comorbid autoimmune disease , demyelinate disease , hematologic abnormality History joint replacement hand and/or wrist ; OR history fuse joint hand and/or wrist Prior history current evidence osteonecrosis/osteomyelitis jaw ; OR active dental jaw condition require oral surgery , nonhealed dental/oral surgery ; OR plan invasive dental procedure ( ) course study Previous exposure denosumab
